data.title: Lotus Exige
data.subtitle: 3.5 V6 S Roadster Euro 5 2dr
data.description: Adaptive Vehicle Solutions Ltd are now able to offer this 2015 (64) registered Lotus Exige S Roadster automatic for sale in Cardiff, South Wales! Having only been released in 2013, the Exige S brought its all-new striking vehicles to the market with an easily removable canvas roof which can be folded and stowed away in the boot compartment! This provided the driver and passenger the ultimate connection to the road with the unfiltered thunder from the powerful sports exhaust, whilst providing an inviting motoring experience with the automatic paddleshift gearbox, accompanied with a certificate of vehicle provenance that states this is only one of fifteen vehicles ever produced with the automatic paddleshift gearbox., Being finished in Arctic Silver Metallic showing off the beautifully distinctive lines across the whole car whilst boasting the race and premium packages which will be listed below in the vehicle features, only three previous owners since its original registration and covered a mere 14400 miles (rounded up) when broken down further equates to roughly 1800 miles per annum. Prior to previous owners purchase, another dashboard had been fit recording a mileage of 2768.2 miles and has since been removed and the original re-fit., An extensive servicing portfolio is available displaying Lotus service records with previous service visits recorded at 2600, 3149, 5053, 5472 and 9107 miles with the last couple of services being completed by Central Lotus in the April of 2018 and a full service carried out by Hanger 111 during recent work and upgrades!, A Venom Red crested, quilted leather sport seating interior accompanied with red twin needle stitching offers a highly comfortable yet exciting interior environment, regardless of your journey type and distance you are in for a joyous experience! , Red Full leather interior, Metallic Arctic Silver, 4 owners, £42,898

data.title: Lotus Exige
data.subtitle: 3.5 V6 S Euro 5 2dr
data.description: The team at Hilton & Moss are delighted to bring this fantastic specification Lotus Exige V6S to the market. , First released in 2011 at the Frankfurt AutoShow the Exige S3 S displayed a vast improvement on the earlier S2 model, most notably the new 3.5 litre V6 supercharged engine. Producing 345BHP at 7,000 RPM the V6 propelled the car from 0-60 in a mere 3.8 seconds and took the car to a top speed of 170MPH., This V6S was first registered in October 2013 and has covered just 38,200 miles since. Although slightly higher than some on the market this Exige must be viewed for full appreciation After being maintained to a fastidious standard by its 3 former keepers this car presents in near immaculate condition. , This Lotus is finished in rare pearlescent Aspen White, a premium paint option which is paired with a full Ebony black leather interior. The gloss black wheels are finished with a diamond cut and the brake calipers in red provide further contrast. This car is also fitted with the Premium Sport Pack and convenience pack. The PSP offers the full leather interior, centre console, steering wheel and door panels. Whilst the convenience pack offers trinket tray divider, USB connection, cup holder and cruise control. This car was also fitted with air-conditioning and a dealer supplied tracker system. , This V6S has an immaculate service history and has been serviced by main dealers only every year from new without fail. The car will be freshly serviced upon sale and has subsequently been fully inspected by our in-house Lotus experts. The car will be supplied with a 12-month warranty for further peace of mind. , We offer competitive finance and welcome part exchange. , Ebony Black interior, Aspen White, £42,000

data.title: Lotus Exige
data.subtitle: 3.5 V6 410 SPORT 2DR
data.description: This is just stunning. Finished in special order Motorsport Black Metallic with Black Alcantara Trim Pack, Special order Motorsport Black Metallic, Contrast Gold Stitching, , Cup Carbon Fibre Bucket Race Seats, Gold Coloured Spoiler Uprights, Body Accents and Diamond Cut Alloy Wheels, Gold Finished Fuel Filler Surround, Carbon Fibre Splitter, , Carbon Fibre Access Panel, Carbon Fibre Rear Engine Cover, Carbon Fibre Rear Aerofoil, Air Conditioning, Motorsport Black Interior Colour Pack, Alcantara Steering Wheel, , Cruise Control, Noise Insulation, Pioneer Audio, Lithium Battery with Cut Off Switch, Lotus Carpet Overmats, Leather Door Sills, Embossed Headrests. Lotus Approved. Only 1,199 miles. Not to be missed. Unique 410 Sport , EXCLUSIVE PAINT - MOTORSPORT BLACK, £73,950
